quote: Stray cats are like two-timing men. He got tired of you and took off. He doesn't find anyone new? He'll come slinking back. By then, if you're smart, you'll have decided you're better without him.
quote_letters: STRAY CATS ARE LIKE TWO-TIMING MEN HE GOT TIRED OF YOU AND TOOK OFF HE DOESNT FIND ANYONE NEW HELL COME SLINKING BACK BY THEN IF YOURE SMART YOULL HAVE DECIDED YOURE BETTER WITHOUT HIM
